welcome_message_body: Welcome to Blacksburg, where you'll find a charming blend of small-town hospitality and innovative energy. Known for its beautiful natural surroundings and vibrant community, we invite you to explore our town and experience all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Virginia Tech Airport serves domestic flights and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Virginia Tech Airport serves flights to and from select international destinations.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at New River Valley Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at New River Valley Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
